name: Letzgro
tagline: Help you navigate a rapidly changing digital world
description:
Letzgro is a software development company. We are focused on videostreaming technologies, SaaS , web applications, innovative digital experiences: VR & AR, full stack technical support, mobile.
We are strongly oriented on innovative technology that can effectively serve to businesses of all scales. Experienced development team and business-oriented creative solution architects - that is what we believe in.
We value our customers and their opinion. That's why we want to be closer to you. We can arrange a meeting in the USA, Canada, Ukraine, Netherlands or Portugal to discuss your project or just to have a cup of coffee.
